General R resources

Michael Stevens

2020-11-13

General_R.Rmd

Below is a collection of resources as a guide for using R.

Immediate resources

  • CRAN's "An Introduction to R" manual
  • Datamentor's "Learn R Programming"
  • Quick-R from Datacamp
  • R tutorial's "R introduction"
  • Bill Petti's Github tutorial
  • QMUL's statistical self help resources

Free courses requiring an account

  • Code academy
  • Datacamp
